title: Enforce a Lease Violation
description: A property manager receives a complaint about a tenant's unauthorized pet.

tasks.description: Verify the tenant's lease agreement to confirm the 'no pets' clause.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the lease prohibits pets.

tasks.description: Issue a formal 'Cure or Quit' notice to the tenant, stating the violation and the timeframe to resolve it.
tasks.expected_outcome: A legal notice is generated and delivered to the tenant.

tasks.description: Follow up with an inspection after the notice period to ensure the violation has been cured.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the pet has been removed from the property.
